channel.title: Lyle Menendez on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lyle Menendez on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Menendez Brothers’ Second Legal Path to Freedom Shut Down Weeks After Parole Denial
item.description: A judge in L.A. was not compelled to grant a new trial for the brothers, convicted of killing their parents at the family’s home over 35 years ago.

item.title: Menendez Brothers’ Second Legal Path to Freedom Shut Down Weeks After Parole Denial
item.description: A judge in L.A. was not compelled to grant a new trial for the brothers, convicted of killing their parents at the family’s home over 35 years ago.

item.title: Charlie Hunnam Unveils His Bone-Chilling Ed Gein in ‘Monster’ Teaser Trailer
item.description: The next season of Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan’s horror anthology focuses on the infamous serial murderer and body snatcher.

item.title: Denied Parole, Erik and Lyle Menendez’s Legal Fight for Freedom Is Far From Over
item.description: The brothers had their hopes of a quick release dashed late last week. Their lawyers, and Gov. Gavin Newsom, could speed up the process — or they could even cut their wait time in half.

item.title: Denied Parole, Erik and Lyle Menendez’s Legal Fight for Freedom Is Far From Over
item.description: The brothers had their hopes of a quick release dashed late last week. Their lawyers, and Gov. Gavin Newsom, could speed up the process — or they could even cut their wait time in half.

item.title: Lyle Menendez Denied Release by California Parole Board, Ending Brothers’ Freedom Bid — for Now
item.description: The elder Menendez brother followed Erik’s Thursday denial after a long day before state commissioners. But their hopes are not entirely dashed yet.

item.title: Lyle Menendez Denied Release by California Parole Board, Ending Brothers’ Freedom Bid — for Now
item.description: The elder Menendez brother followed Erik’s Thursday denial after a long day before state commissioners. But their hopes are not entirely dashed yet.

item.title: Lyle Menendez Denied Parole, a Day After Brother Erik Was Also Denied
item.description: The California Parole Board on Friday rejected Lyle Menendez’s bid for release, a day after a separate panel refused to parole his brother Erik. The brothers made their first appearances before

item.title: Erik Menendez Denied Parole in First Hearing After Resentencing, Will Remain in Prison
item.description: His older brother, Lyle Menendez, will face a parole hearing on Friday.

item.title: Erik Menendez Denied Parole in First Hearing After Resentencing, Will Remain in Prison

item.title: First-Time Nominee Cooper Koch Is “Devastated” Over Emmy Snubs for Two of His ‘Monsters’ Co-Stars
item.description: “That’s the one sort of bummer from today,” says Koch, who was nominated for best lead actor for his portrayal of Erik Menendez in ‘Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story.’

item.title: ‘Monsters: The Erik and Lyle Menendez Story’ Nominated for Best Limited Series, 3 Acting Emmys
item.description: Cooper Koch, Javier Bardem and Chloe Sevigny were all honored for their performances in the Netflix series.
